Thermoregulation

Thermoregulation Anaesthetised patients lose heat by:

NICE guidelines 2008:

Pre-op: Temp must be > 36° before anaesthesia

Intra-op:

Monitor temp if:

o surgery >30min

o temp <36°

o ASA >2

o GA+RA

Fluid warmer if:

- >500ml fluid

Post-op: warm if <36°

[xxx cite NICE + WARM]
